name: "Surging Harmonies of the Springs"
description: A temporary resting bench crafted from the commonly used "White Chestnut Oak Wood," found around Colomche Plaza in the "People of the Springs."\nIt is said that the bench's name derives from its unique seating experience â€” sitting on this bench while enjoying performances, the melodious music of Colomche Plaza is echoed by the flowing water, creating a harmonious effect akin to a new layer of "harmony" added to the melody.
